title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 18 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 18 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Amber Smith, former Deputy Assistant to the Defense Secretary in the Trump administration and combat helicopter pilot in Iraq and Afghanistan, talks to C&B about the unfolding Afghanistan disaster. Trump sounds like he's running. Trump on Operation Warp Speech. He's not anti-vax, but that doesn't fit the narrative. More and more people are coming around to C&B's point of view on mask and vaccine mandates. Gallup poll on remote work, attitudes on mask and vaccine mandates.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
